text.title: When Is The Best Time to Post on YouTube? #AskSean
text.p: does posting time affect the amount of
views you're going to get on your
YouTube video the answer is yes and no
first of all you should definitely
upload at a strategic time I mean
YouTube itself goes into your YouTube
studio and shows you when most of your
viewers are online but even if you don't
have that data you can just imagine if
most of your viewers are going to watch
after work that's when you should upload
if most of your viewers are going to
maybe watch early morning or us viewers
it's going to be during Us hours so just
be smart if you upload in the middle of
the night when everyone's asleep then
that's going to affect your views but
Todd from YouTube who's behind the
algorithm also said never underestimate
the
longterm opportunity for your video to
get views a week 4 weeks 6 weeks 8 weeks
some of our videos pop on think media
around 200 days so if you put out a
great video and allow the algorithm to
find an audience for it then don't be
super discouraged by day one performance
look forward to the opportunity for that
video to continue to get views for weeks
and months to come if you like this clip
and are ready to take your YouTube
channel to another level go to think
masterclass.com where you can get access
to a one-hour YouTube strategy class
where I break down the exact system that
we use at think media to generate
hundreds of thousands of views per day
just go to think masterclass.com or
click the link in the description
